channel.title: Need help with jail creation
channel.description:
[url=http://img149.imageshack.us/my.php?image=moparlq7.png]http://img149.imageshack.us/my.php?image=moparlq7.png[/url] i know its moparscape 3.2 w/Aryan but i wanted to see the coords
so how to you add like a create or somthing in front of the door?
how do you make a copper and tin rock and a bank booth?
and finally how would i go about making it so that if you break a rule i tele you to the jail with a command and whilst there you have to mine 200 copper and tin ores and then you are released?

item.title: Need help with jail creation
item.dc:creator: @Elf_Magik Elf Magik
item.description:
@Elf_Magik wrote:

Bob what base you using?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with jail creation
item.dc:creator: @_Paranoia †Paranoia†
item.description:
@_Paranoia wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:4, topic:230414”]don’t wanna be a jerk, but if you can find a way to connect a time system along with applying it after they log off… alls they have to do is log off to remove teleblock. therefore, your jail is owned by the player.

summery: jails fail.[/quote]Meep Meep, Agreed.

Read full topic

item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

don’t wanna be a jerk, but if you can find a way to connect a time system along with applying it after they log off… alls they have to do is log off to remove teleblock. therefore, your jail is owned by the player.

item.title: Need help with jail creation
item.dc:creator: @Elf_Magik Elf Magik
item.description:
@Elf_Magik wrote:

Ummm…not sure about the copper and tin ore thing but to block the door just to to client.java and serach for makeGlobalobjectClick next until you find a long list code codes. Copy one of the codes and paste it at the bottom. Then replace the first 2 numbers (####,#### X first Y second) with the coords of where you want the object and the 4 digit # after that you replace with a 2213 for a bank booth. Then next number (will be a 1,2,3, or 4) will determine the direction of the bank booth

Read full topic
